text:
@realDonaldTrump "Winning" against COVID-19 is like "winning" against the FLU. You can strive to prevent it with an eventual vaccine, but it will always find a way to mutate just like the annual influenza.
So "winning" against COVID-19 will FAIL like most of your other FAILED "winning" promises.
